aaa-tacacs-server-config.description: Configuration data for a TACACS+ server

port.description: The port number on which to contact the TACACS server

secret-key.description:
The unencrypted shared key used between the authentication
server and the device.

source-address.description: Source IP address to use in messages to the TACACS server

aaa-tacacs-server-state.description: Operational state data for a TACACS+ server

aaa-tacacs-server-top.description: Top-level grouping for TACACS+ sever data

tacacs.description: Top-level container for TACACS+ server data

state.description: Operational state data for TACACS+ server
